Lava Bomb.name: Lava Bomb
Lava Bomb.fullText:
Herald of Vezzuvu Attack 11Lava Bomb

You translate a heavy molten blob from the Elemental Chaos and drop it on a distant foe. Splatters of lava scorch nearby foes.

Encounter        Elemental, Fire
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Reflex
    Level 21: Highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d8 + your highest ability modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Effect: Each creature adjacent to the target takes 10 fire damage.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 132.
Lava Bomb.flavor: You translate a heavy molten blob from the Elemental Chaos and drop it on a distant foe. Splatters of lava scorch nearby foes.
Lava Bomb.attack:
Highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Reflex
    Level 21: Highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Reflex

Lava Bomb.effect: Each creature adjacent to the target takes 10 fire damage.

Volcanic Wrath.name: Volcanic Wrath
Volcanic Wrath.fullText:
Herald of Vezzuvu Attack 20Volcanic Wrath

You open a rift to a volcanic eruption in the Elemental Chaos, blasting nearby foes and producing a flood of lava.

Daily        Elemental, Fire, Zone
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Highest ability modifier + 5 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + your highest ability modifier damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). You push the target up to 3 squares.

Miss: Ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. For creatures other than you the zone is difficult terrain and lightly obscured, and any creature that ends its turn there takes 10 fire damage.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 133.
Volcanic Wrath.flavor: You open a rift to a volcanic eruption in the Elemental Chaos, blasting nearby foes and producing a flood of lava.
Volcanic Wrath.onHit: 3d8 + your highest ability modifier damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). You push the target up to 3 squares.
Volcanic Wrath.effect: The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. For creatures other than you the zone is difficult terrain and lightly obscured, and any creature that ends its turn there takes 10 fire damage.

Vezzuvu’s Balm.name: Vezzuvu’s Balm
Vezzuvu’s Balm.fullText:
Herald of Vezzuvu Utility 12Vezzuvu’s Balm

You absorb the heat of a fire attack, converting it into healing and empowering your next attack.

Daily        Elemental, Healing
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You take fire damage.

Effect: You don’t take the fire damage. Instead, you regain a number of hit points equal to the fire damage you would have taken (don’t apply your resistance), and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Elemental Chaos, page(s) 133.
Vezzuvu’s Balm.flavor: You absorb the heat of a fire attack, converting it into healing and empowering your next attack.
Vezzuvu’s Balm.effect: You don’t take the fire damage. Instead, you regain a number of hit points equal to the fire damage you would have taken (don’t apply your resistance), and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
